data.title: Alan A. Milne's biography | Baamboozle
data.meta_description: This quiz is related to the listening task for grade 8 (Kapriuk, 8, ex.6 p.127). True / False statements. In the answer section there are correct answers to check.
data.text:
He was the editor of the university paper.

As a student of Cambridge university he became an editor of the university paper.

Some of Milne's plays were staged in New York City.

Some of the plays were staged in London, and one of them was even shown in New York City.

"When web were very young" is the name of short stories for children that Milne wrote in 1924.

The collection of poems for children "When we were very young" was published in 1924.

The stories about Winnie-the-Pooh were written after the publication of the collection of poems.

In 1926 the stories about Winnie-the-Pooh appeared (the collection of poems was published in 1924).

"It's Too Late Now" is the name of Milne's autobiography.

In 1939, his autobiography "It's Too Late Now" was published.
